Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica

The Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica (AISF) gathers together all the Italian students of physics. It was founded in Heidelberg in August 2014 and since January 2015 is a National Committee for the International Association of Physics Students (IAPS). It has in the last two years organized 8 international events and over 30 national excursions, becoming one of the most active national committee in IAPS.
